title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 407 - Consolidated Services Plan
content:

State Regulations
§ 407.1 - General statement
§ 407.2 - Services program year
§ 407.3 - Submission of the plan and annual implementation reports
§ 407.4 - Services
§ 407.5 - Content of the plan
§ 407.6 - Annual implementation report
§ 407.7 - Criteria for approval of plan and annual implementation reports
§ 407.8 - Procedures for review and approval of the plan and annual implementation reports
§ 407.9 - Monitoring of the plan and annual implementation reports

§ 407.11 - Waivers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 407

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34-a, 409-d [1], 473[2][b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
